column1: 1st  Respondent by his  letter dated  2012-11-05,  had  informed all  relevant

column2: that he  had  sought advice from the Commissioner General  of Lands
with  regard to the dispute between  parties relating  to the succession
that the Commissioner General  of Lands  had  advised  him to divide
the lands with the consent of the successors  in terms of the 3rd
schedule to the Land  Development Ordinance,  amongst the parties
